org.apache.arrow.flight

Class FlightServer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.arrow.flight.FlightServer.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    FlightServer

    public static final class FlightServer.Builder
extends Object
    A builder for Flight servers.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public FlightServer build()
        Create the server for this builder.

      • maxInboundMessageSize

        public FlightServer.Builder maxInboundMessageSize(int maxMessageSize)
        Set the maximum size of a message. Defaults to "unlimited", depending on the underlying transport.

      • useTls

        public FlightServer.Builder useTls(File certChain,
                                   File key)
                            throws IOException
        Enable TLS on the server.
        Parameters:
        certChain - The certificate chain to use.
        key - The private key to use.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • useTls

        public FlightServer.Builder useTls(InputStream certChain,
                                   InputStream key)
        Enable TLS on the server.
        Parameters:
        certChain - The certificate chain to use.
        key - The private key to use.

      • executor

        public FlightServer.Builder executor(ExecutorService executor)
        Set the executor used by the server.

        Flight will NOT take ownership of the executor. The application must clean it up if one is provided. (If not provided, Flight will use a default executor which it will clean up.)

      • authHandler

        public FlightServer.Builder authHandler(ServerAuthHandler authHandler)
        Set the authentication handler.

      • headerAuthenticator

        public FlightServer.Builder headerAuthenticator(CallHeaderAuthenticator headerAuthenticator)
        Set the header-based authentication mechanism.

      • transportHint

        public FlightServer.Builder transportHint(String key,
                                          Object option)
        Provide a transport-specific option. Not guaranteed to have any effect.

      • middleware

        public <T extends FlightServerMiddleware> FlightServer.Builder middleware(FlightServerMiddleware.Key<T> key,
                                                                          FlightServerMiddleware.Factory<T> factory)
        Add a Flight middleware component to inspect and modify requests to this service.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The middleware type.
        Parameters:
        key - An identifier for this middleware component. Service implementations can retrieve the middleware instance for the current call using FlightProducer.CallContext.
        factory - A factory for the middleware.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the key already exists

      • allocator
